Windlord:
 Windlord fired 25 times against Gemini. "When you come back we will be ready to fight, LIZARD!!!"
  Legendarynemasis@... wrote: Gemini Dragon looked at the stumbling seekker, apparently amused by 
the bot. However its focus once again was focused on the base that 
was in front of it.

Gemini Dragon: "Bah... water will not stop my flames. It is time to 
blast you all to smithereins!"

And with those words Gemini Dragon prepared to unleash another 
amphobois attack. However unline the last time when the right head 
opened only smoke came out, and the left head only shot a cloud of 
mist. The tail also sizzling slightly. Not knowing what was wrong the 
beast ran a quick diagnostic and found that the last amphobois attack 
had drained the gestalts power reserves to depletion, and the last 
ice beam and fire breath just drained its reserves completely. Upon 
this realization the dragon sweat dropped. Before flapping its giant 
wings and beginning to fly away.

Gemini Dragon: "Eh heh.... Illbe back for you just as soon as I get 
more energy I'll be back to destroy you all!"

The beast screeched out loudly as it made all ten of the remaining 
funnels disenegrate into ash to hopefully cover its escape.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Seekker was hit directly by the ice beam sending the bot flying 
> through the air back the way he had come.  "ICCEEE 
> CREEAAMM...The ICE CREAM MAN IS COMING!!!!" Seekker 
> yelled out as he hit the ground, icecles hangin off his bodily 
parts.  
> Getting up he tried to walk but his leg shielding shattered leaving 
> only his circtutry and hydraulic parts out.  "Oh my, look at me, 
I'm 
> unnaprotpiate"
> 
> The vines surrounding the Chivtron base where the flame hit burnt 
> away, before new ones came in.  Slowly the vines began to release 
> a mist of pure water.
